entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.FlexoModelObject

property.name: userIdentifier
property.description: Unique ID of the user (used for team synchronization)

property.name: flexoID
property.description: Unique ID generated and maintained by Flexo

property.name: dontGenerate
property.description: Check this box, if you don't want this node to generate documentation

property.name: description
property.description: Defines widget name

property.name: hasSpecificDescriptions
property.description: Wheter the specific descriptions should be used in the generated documentation or not

property.name: specificDescriptions
property.description: Hashtable(String,String) that contains a name of a DocType as a key, and a description specific to that DocType as the value

property.name: dynamicProperties
property.description: Hashtable(String,String) that contains dynamic properties (data that are not handled by application, but need to be stored in the context of back compatibility)

entity.description: Root class for all objects of Flexo

property.name: customer
property.description: Name of the customer that will appear in the generated documentation

property.name: version
property.description: Version of this document

entity.name: org.openflexo.foundation.toc.TOCEntry
entity.description: Element of the hierarchy of a table of content

property.name: tocEntries
property.description: Sub elements of the hierarchy of a table of content

property.name: title
property.description: The title of the entry of the table of content

property.name: objectReference
property.description: The associated flexo model object reference

property.name: identifier
property.description: A unique identifier to be able to find back an automatically created entry.

property.name: index
property.description: The index order of this toc entry (they should be serialized correctly, but for sure, we add this argument)

property.name: isReadOnly
property.description: Wheter this entry can be edited or not

property.name: startOnANewPage
property.description: this entry must start on a new page

property.name: includeStatusList
property.description: (relevant for processes)

property.name: subType
property.description: (relevant for processes)

property.name: recursionEnabled
property.description: this entry may contains sub entries recursively deduced from the model (relevant for processes)

property.name: resourceName
property.description: The associated generated resource name (only if isReadOnly is true)

property.name: content
property.description: The content of this table of content entry (only if isReadOnly is false)

property.name: lastUpdateDate
property.description: The last time this object was updated or one of its son
